name: MACaptionAppearanceFontStyle
desc: A value that specifies a font style.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: The default font style for all caption text.

items.name: case monospacedWithSerif
items.desc: The font style preferred for the monospaced serif font style.

items.name: case proportionalWithSerif
items.desc: The font style preferred for the proportional serif font style.

items.name: case monospacedWithoutSerif
items.desc: The font style preferred for the monospaced sans serif font style.

items.name: case proportionalWithoutSerif
items.desc: The font style preferred for the proportional sans serif font style.

items.name: case casual
items.desc: The font style preferred for the casual font style.

items.name: case cursive
items.desc: The font style preferred for the cursive font style.

items.name: case smallCapital
items.desc: The font style preferred for the small capital font style.
